item.title: Hyperplane in SVM
item.description: Introduction Support Vector Machines (SVMs) are powerful machine learning models that can be used for both classification and regression tasks. In classification, the goal is to find a hyperplane that separates the data points of different classes with maximum margin.

item.title: Welcome to My Site
item.description: On this site I show some of the projects I’ve been working on as well as some notes and ideas about topics I am exploring.
